original_text: And the Father who sent me has himself testified concerning me. You have never heard his voice nor seen his form,
korean_text: 또한 나를 보내신 아버지께서 친히 나를 위하여 증언하셨느니라 너희는 아무 때에도 그 음성을 듣지 못하였고 그 형상을 보지 못하였으며

sentences.original_text: And the Father who sent me
You have never heard his voice
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 그의 음성을 들어본 적이 없다
